description: A senior politician says the island should be prepared for unexpected costs due to Covid or Brexit.
title: Brexit costs warning as Guernsey 2021 budget approved
title_page: Brexit costs warning as Guernsey 2021 budget approved - BBC News
maintext: Ahead of the debate, Overseas Aid and Development Commission President Chris Blin said a move to keep the aid budget at its original level could not be supported due to the "current economic challenges and uncertainty".
